instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1707: What is A1707? A1707 is a model number for a 15 inch size MacBook Pro Retina from years Late 2016, Mid 2017 with EMC 3072, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00281, 820-00928..
definitions.820-00281: What is 820-00281? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A water damage
threads.message:
MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with water damage
power 20V 0.03A(picture attached), power button do nothing, only black screen
pictures of water damage attached
motherboard <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A
goal: get user data
Please advise.

threads.title: MacBook Pro <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1707</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00281</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A water damage
threads.message: If SSD area wasn't affected by liquid, you can use dedicated Apple recovery tool to access stored data.
